A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: To all the complaining fans: You would have hated anything that came on that screen. By the time the movie came out\, you had already written\, shot\, edited\, and watched it in your head. They couldn't have won. You already decided what that episode was and when it wasn't \"your\" Star Wars\, you threw a fit.\n\nI thoroughly loved how exciting and adventurous this movie was. It came out of left field like just like the \"I am your father\" scene from Empire. I am certain that if the internet was around when the original trilogy came out\, fans would have also lost their minds and mobbed the reviews. This film will hold up and the professional reviews have proved that
